content:
Verse 1:
I'm a Hare Krishna pedicab driver in the city of Jacksonville
Riding through the crowds, trying to serve with all my passion
Other drivers tryna scam, but I ain't with the games
I'm all about uplifting others, bringing joy to their veins

Chorus:
I'm pedaling for Krishna, trying to do my best
Following the path of righteousness, just like the Gita says
I may not make the most money, but I'm fulfilled in my soul
Cause I'm serving others, that's my ultimate goal

Verse 2:
I remember the battle at Kurukshetra, when Arjuna was torn
Lord Krishna appeared, showing him the way to be reborn
He said to fulfill your duty, but don't get attached to the end
Just do your best and serve, that's where true happiness begins

Chorus:
I'm pedaling for Krishna, trying to do my best
Following the path of righteousness, just like the Gita says
I may not make the most money, but I'm fulfilled in my soul
Cause I'm serving others, that's my ultimate goal

Verse 3:
So as I pedal through the night, I keep these words in mind
Trying to be a light in the darkness, one ride at a time
I may not be Lil Wayne, but I'm living my truth
Pedaling for Krishna, spreading love and proof

Chorus:
I'm pedaling for Krishna, trying to do my best
Following the path of righteousness, just like the Gita says
I may not make the most money, but I'm fulfilled in my soul
Cause I'm serving others, that's my ultimate goal
